WRITING.TEXT: Having breasts. When my friends and I were little, we were super hyped about having breasts. Wish I was flat, lol

I am from Czech Republic and I honestly don't like Czech food in general. It's often meat (I'm vegetarian) and too salty or too sweet or very oily. The thing I hate the most isn't that typical but we do that a lot - fried cheese. I really just taste salt and oil. The way we do steaks is something I could talk about as well. But other Czechs love it.
Nobody does that anymore since I said I will kill myself if they won't stop on my 7th birthday. I was a nice kid

My PE teacher at my old school. She didn't really give a fucc about our health, I had some problems with my spine and shouldn't do gymnastics - sure I got some serious lessons to become a professional or what. She also didn't let girls have a rest if they were on they period. There was one girl with serious cramps, she was suffering just sitting in the class and she was almost fainting, but the nice teacher wouldn't let her take a seat, she would rather have a kid faint in the middle of a push-up. Her excuse was that she never felt any pain, so if anybody felt anything worse than a discomfort, she told them they are faking. She also didn't have problems insulting us for our appearance or physical abilities or people we were friends with and she compared us to our sporty classmates. Nobody really cared about her, because ,,she was just leading lazy kids to sports." She is the reason I changed school, I was her main target for my chubby body, short height and my introversion. I sometimes have something like anxiety attack to think about her and I have a hard time facing anybody I was in a class with. Sports never were my thing but after this experience, I feel like a piece of garbage.
#10024;We'll carry on, we'll carry on And though you're dead and gone, believe me Your memory will carry on We'll carry on And in my heart, I can't contain it The anthem won't explain it #10024;
I would rather have girls fantasizing about me.
Having friends who respect me as I am, not trying to change me, my life or my opinions. I don't need people love me for who I am, all I really need and appreciate is a respect.
,,Well..."

Mental problems and illnesses. I don't think ill people should have the name of their illness tattooed on their forehead, I just think people often know only about stereotypes (like, schizophrenic necessarily has to be violent) and a lot of people won't go to a therapy because they think they would be judged. Basically - I wish people saw mental illnesses as they truly are and not as a taboo.
I can't sleep with my door open.

Socializing is a good thing, but not for me
I cried while imagining it
I kinda love being part of introvert club, but at the same time I would love to be extrovert, lol
Indeed. The extroverted people who disrespect introverts are the worst, nothing against extroverts, but some of them just suck energy out of me
I hope it gets better for you.
It's hard for us introverts, so it's nice to have friends who respect you. Not anybody does understand the space we need to recover our energy...
Avocados. I love them, but I always cut it when it's too raw or too old.
When they love books, drawing, anime or MBTI. I also love when people are good listeners, when they don't just wait for their turn to talk but actually talk with you about stuff you like and care.

When I like the job I'm doing, I get really focused and nothing can distract me until I'm done. I don't work very fast, but the result is high in quality and I'm pretty proud of that. I am also very open about many stuff that are taboo for other people,for example menstruation. Few of my friends said they aren't ashamed of it and don't worry to ask for a tampon anymore because I helped them open about it.

Not much good. A lot of anxiety attack, people tell me I'm paranoid and I often see things that apper to not exist. I would love to go to a therapist but my mom thinks psychologist are useless and all you get from a therapy are 999999 illnesses you didn't even know about and bunch of pills instead of solving problem. Searching a mental help is one of the things I'm gonna do once I turn 18 or get out of my house.

My girlfriend helped me a lot, but I never got out of it. I cut myself for the last time about 3 weeks ago but I wasn't far from doing that again recently. I usually do that when I have anxiety attack and I don't remember doing that, I just have and feel the scar. My friends let me try mariuana to control my attacks and it helped a lot. Fuck people who smoke just for fun or bcs it's cool or what, but it can be used as a cure if you don't smoke too much and know well your dealer. I hope I can control my attacks without mariuana as soon as possible and 100% stop cutting and beating myself.

I like autumn, bcs it's cold but not too much, the trees look pretty and it feels nice to have a warm soup, tea or chocolate milk. Reading books and drawing also feels different during this season. The days ate getting shorter so I like to light some candles instead of turning on the light. I also love wearing thick jumpers and hoodies or wearing fluffy socks. Winter is also great, but it's too cold and the snow is pretty but I don't like walking in it.
And the fluffy socks #10084; #65039;

I usually put my alarm close enough to hear it but far enough so I have to get out of bed to stop it. I also put other stuff like bottle of water or my glasses far away from my bed so I have to get out of bed to get em.

I became vegan and I had to check what I'm eating. When I found out what I was putting inside of my body, I started to care more about eating healthy. I stopped being vegan about 8 months ago and I'm only vegetarian, but I still care about the food I'm eating. I don't have ideal figure but I feel healthy and I don't weigh as much as I did before. You don't need to go to a diet, just don't eat shit and chemicals and find a way to enjoy exercising.
I would give up touch, taste and hearing. I love food but I enjoy the smell more than taste and I love how my gf smells, I think I would survive without touch and I love silence a lot.
Anything between 25-30
I stopped eating meat because I told myself this. I would never put meat in my mouth again.

It was my 5th birthday and I made some friends, so I invited them thinking they would wish me nice birthday and celebrate with me. Most of them didn't even talk with me, they just went into my room, took out my toys and played with them. If anybody talked to me, it was Why didn't you invite ____? Why do you only have one cake? and other shit. I tried to join the kids playing but nobody wanted to play with me, so I just went into my room and read and waited for kids to leave. Nobody really cleaned anything, some of my toys were broken and food was all over the floor. They ate almost everything, I didn't even taste my own cake. It was a breaking point for my anxiety, I didn't have a birthday party since then and I have hard time trusting people. I was a happy energetic kid before but I turned cold, anxious and I had a first experience with self harming about a week about the party - I bit myslef or beat myself. It literally destroyed my personality.
She lets her mother manipulate her, she is 18 but I think her mother treats her as a 10 year old and she doesn't have a problem with that.

I think early teen age, because you get first acne, hair, menstruation (if you are a girl, of course), it all is new and hormones go crazy and you have to deal with it. Then 18-25 bscause of stress at school, getting job, looking for your future husband/wife, people expect you to grow up from a teen to a mature adult. Then 70+ because of the health problems, losing your friends and partner, loneliness etc

I feel like religions have no place in this century. It has done its job explaining what people didn't understand before, now we have science and facts. There is no god and never was, no Satan, no hell, no heaven... The only things we have from religinos nowadays are fights, hate and wasted time. Believing is one thing, but spending time in churches or doing some rituals is a wasted time. The stupidest thing about that are parents forcing their children to be brainwashed. Believe whatever you want, but think about your time and don't use your god to explain or suppress things.

Thanks. People should learn facts instead of wasting time sitting in the church thinking some kind of entity would make their wishes come true and make them happy. Not much different from little kids believing in Santa Claus, fairies or unicorns. But the kids at least grow up and learn to live with the truth.

One girl in my class was supposed to make a sentence "I don't like when my brother annoys me when chewing too loud." She said ,,I haven't like when my brother me poison biting much loud." That's how our native language works - we say haven't like instead of don't like, we have the same word for poisoning and annoying or chewing and biting, and we say me annoys instead of annoys me. Her English didn't improve since then, I would say it's even worse.

You're just lazy. Your life must be boring. I will invite some more people so it's not just the two of us. You only look at your phone and don't even go out of your room. I will call, texting is boring. You have no life. Small talk is fun. I don't understand you. Books are bullshit. Drawing is bullshit. You only think of yourself. Stop over thinking. Internet friends aren't real friends. Introversion doesn't exist, it's just people being lazy or mentally ill. You should see psychologist. You don't look like you are introvert. You are not shy, you are just not being honest. You only think about stuff, why don't you do stuff? If everyone was like you, humanity would propably still be in caves. You have no future. You are wird. You won't get job like this. When did you become like this? You must have trauma/be depressed. I'm glad I'm not like you. Why don't you make more friends, you only have few. No successful people are introverts. Go talk to people, it will make you energetic. There's more.

WRITING.TITLE: People of Reddit who heard about MBTI (Myers-Briggs Type Indicator), what's your type and how accurate the description of your type is? And why do you like or dislike your type?

WRITING.TEXT: I am an INFP, very accurate for me. I love being introverted and I enjoy spending lots of time thinking, but sometimes I feel very isolated.
I got this type when I tried MBTI for the first time. I really like INTPs, you are nice and smart people
Glad to hear!
I love the joy and energy around ESTPs, agree you are fun people!
It's indeed both nice and scary how accurate it can be
Sometimes it's better when somebody who knows you well tells you what is accurate about you or what type exactly you are. We are all unique individuals, so it's important to be a bit sceptical
Glad you are happy with your type!

Oh, that's my favourite type! I read INFPs help others a lot as well, and I don't feel like that too. We can't be 100% as the description says, but that doesn't mean you aren't good person. Your differences are what makes you an amazing person.

It indeed is. I think introverts wouldn't be that shy if they were treated better, we would still enjoy time alone and have few close friends but we would be more confident and more open about ourselves.
And when you tell them to be quiet they will be mean or louder. Know that feeling.
I understand some people need something to believe in, the people I hate are the ones who use their god as an excuse for everything or force their religion to others.

I was buying cola and there was a kid staring at me with a serious face. I asked him what's wrong and he said slowly, with unnaturally serious voice "Cola is poisonous. Don't drink it or you wil die in pain." Not the scaries5 thing to hear but I returned the cola and bought mineral water to be a good example. I met him again after a while and he gave me such a sweet smile when he saw me holding a water and said to his mom "Look! I saved her life when telling her to not buy cola!" His mom was very proud of him and thanked me for being a good example. I felt so bad for the kid when drinking and eating unhealthy so I started eating healthier. I never thought a little guy could completely change my diet.
Dark chocolate. As bitter as my mood
I would get super depressed. You would see all your loved ones die, all the wars and climate changes, even the end od of the world

She was forcing me to go out a lot, socialize, she was too extroverted for me. She was nice and energetic, but I was exhausted and if I stayed with her for the rest of my life, we would propably end up living two separate lives, she would travel and socialize and I would stay in my room and paint and read, so it wouldn't last. When I told her about breakup, she said she was thinking about it as well because she wasn't sure if she is a lesbian or not. Turned out she wasn't, she has a guy now and we are both happy.

I get very unmotivated to do stuff that would normally make me happy and I just lie in my bed not doing anything for hours and hours. When I have the worst days I forget things, memories blend together and I have problems remembering details. Everything is dark and blur and it makes depression even worse. People think I hate them because I often avoid them so I have a hard time keeping relationships. You have better days but it never goes away and it's exhausting.
I think I would be that kind of person everyone was afraid of so I was burned alive, drowned or stabbed to death.
Wish I could be where you are

Art lessons. It might be boring for some people but if you have a good teacher who actually knows some art, you can get better imagination. That's also problem with schools (or at least at my school), cuz people think anyone can teach art. Most of teachers we had just found some "art" on Google, figured out how could it be made and told us to do it. My classmates who aren't in any art clubs have no idea what art is, when they see abstract art they say they could do it as well and give it some poetic name. No, you couldn't, because nobody teached you to have imagination and you propably would even know how to mix the colors. You maybe don't need to paint well to get a job, but you might need an imagination to do it well.
That's too scary for others and traumatic for the kids.
Focusing on your breath. Each breath in and out should be long and I like to count how long does each last. Makes you focused and calmer.
If you say it like that... You don't live if you don't actually live your life and only survive.
My black shirt with white crosses or my black skirt. I also love all of my thick jumpers

I had a panic attack after triggering one traumatic memory. I couldn't get myself together and cried and had problems breathing and my friend told me she does have nerves for my shit and I should pack my things and go home. I went out and sat next to a tree for like 15 minutes before I had a strenght to go home. I don't under how could I ever be friends with her, she only cares about her looks and if you tell the stuff she wants to hear.
I posted art on G+ and she liked it, whe started talking a lot and we found out we have a lot in common so we bwcame very close friends amd on 24th May 2017 we got together.
You are welcome! Thank you as well!
